# === Python ===
# AI-irrelevant files for Python projects
# Generated by ainit.dev

# Byte-compiled / cached
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual environments
.venv/
venv/
env/
ENV/

# Distribution / packaging
dist/
build/
*.egg-info/
*.egg
sdist/
wheels/

# Lock files (large, no AI value)
poetry.lock
Pipfile.lock
uv.lock

# Testing & coverage
.tox/
.nox/
.coverage
coverage.xml
htmlcov/
.pytest_cache/

# Type checking cache
.mypy_cache/
.pytype/
.pyre/

# Jupyter notebooks checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# C extensions
*.so
*.pyd
